meaningMnemonic:
The <kanji>country</kanji> will <kanji>benefit</kanji> from these actions. It will create <vocabulary>national benefit</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>national interests</vocabulary>.

国益 is a word that is often found in formal political, diplomatic, and economic writing.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
